quote: Those who have dissected or inspected many [bodies] have at least learnt to doubt, while others who are ignorant of anatomy and do not take the trouble to attend it are in no doubt at all.
quote_letters: THOSE WHO HAVE DISSECTED OR INSPECTED MANY BODIES HAVE AT LEAST LEARNT TO DOUBT WHILE OTHERS WHO ARE IGNORANT OF ANATOMY AND DO NOT TAKE THE TROUBLE TO ATTEND IT ARE IN NO DOUBT AT ALL
